caption: How can I respond to this place when I did not eat there
I do not like there food.

Worst chinese food I've had in a while. Got 2 chicken combo meals (one sesame and one general tso) and I don't even think it was actual chicken. It was like soggy mush. Didn't resemble chicken at all. Was gross. Had to stop eating both meals.
VERY BAD
Clean & good food...
It is just nice and within walking distance
It's good, food is good and prices are low. The restaurant is fairly clean

I can't believe these reviews are so high this restaurant is the worst I've been too I've ordered food with my friends and there was this employee nagging about my friends sitting down waiting for our food it was extremely unprofessional and very rude. He kept talking about us and saying black people are annyoing and loud there were no need for those types of comments and I found hair and a left over glove in my bag and the hair in my food absolutely disgusting, hygiene should be better here I can't say much the food gave me stomach pains and I was sick in bed for about 3 days it sucked but I know not to order from such a place this is my opinion and everyone has one.
The delivery man, Jason Zhao, was mad rude for no reason. Kid is from hell or something
Always good food...delivery always on time
Food was good but delivery driver was rude to me for no reason  telling me not to order his food IDK what  i did to get that sort of response
Don't go here. Found hair in my tray and dead roach on the floor while eating. Staff don't care about anything and just want money. Not the place to be.

Quite possibly the best Chinese food for delivery available in Bay Ridge. Fresh tasty and large selection. Great vegetarian choices. Slightly above average in pricing but very worth it. Highly recommended
Best home cooked food around..super fresh and the owners are fantastic
Food,atmosphere, and service was really good.
Very good food and great service really nice people.
Great food, outstanding operation.
Friendly fast service, excellent food. Highly recommend!
Great food and decent prices. Friendly staff. Good choice.
First time trying very excellent good customer service I would love to take the family here again
Everything I’ve had here has been delicious! The owner is wonderful, inviting, caring and makes all her clients feel like home. Thank you for great food and great service.
Very good food pleasant atmosphere very nice waitress I really enjoyed the food my daughter goes there a lot
Great service and great food.
Clean place, friendly people, fresh food, timely service.
awesome! High quality food and service.
I come almost every week without disappointment, I love it here!
It is excellent, and every visit will meet different guests. The server is good and the price is relatively reasonable.
Best price, excellent service, food is delicious.
Authentic Chinese food is available here, he is fresh and the environment is good. Reasonable price and I will visit again!
The food was delicious, the staff were good, followed the plates full of food, everything was so fresh! We also have a large team and there is no problem at all. I plan to go back many times!
Really good food and service! The staff is helpful in ordering super.
The food is great! I will definitely recommend this place and choose it next time with friends who are eager to eat something in the area.
Comfortable environment, good choice, I like it here.
The service is very good and fast and is delivered within the specified time.
This is my second time, and it will only get better!

More like Pearl of China than any other Chinese dish. The ingredients there are so fresh, the staff is friendly and have excellent customer service skills. The owner is a very good person and remembers his regulars.
The delivery came way sooner than expected, it arrived hot and everything was correct. The food was great!! Best Chinese I’ve had in this area.

I just ordered Chinese from here and the delivery time is moderate. The deliveryman is very good. I ordered chicken noodles, steamed dumplings and broccoli chicken (not just for me). These parts are the right size and the food is satisfactory. The dumplings are cooked very well and there are not many places where you can steam dumplings. They are also bigger than I have ever seen. I will definitely order it from here.
Great food to choose from... ready in about 15 minutes... a great choice for combination and main course. Will come back!
Excellent food! Delicious fresh Chinese food! I will come back for a long time and recommend this restaurant.
Fresh food and quality service. This is always the choice between me and my family. We are always very satisfied with the food and service. highly recommended!
Terrible customer service great food lol what matters atleast

Sadly I have ordered from here a few times normally the food is very good but last night was a bust. Starters they ran out of duck so I had to order something else for my husband the Pineapple Chicken. I had gotten the spare rib combo and my ribs were NOT even cut through but attached to each other, the pineapple chicken was sad and bland that my husband ended up sharing my food with me. Also, I had still not gotten a credit for the price difference btw the duck order and the chicken. I am not sure about ordering from here again. Unless they seriously improve.
It is good. They are fast, they will try to make you happy. And you know what you are getting when ordering from Pearl of China. Many options, and they are one of the better ones.

My brother and I would usually order from her whenever we were tired of eating home food. We usually call and order and they are nice enough to come to the other side of the house and go upstairs to give it to us. The food is good I’ve tasted way better from Queens Chinese places. But it’s still decent and affordable.

I've been to many Chinese spots in my life living in new York. And this is by far the rudest place I've ever been to in my life of any restaurant. The lady at the counter is just unnecessarily angry.  Rude for no reason. Makes no sense.
Good chinese food. I usually get the pork dumpling big bowl soup with a side of chicken wings.
best Chinese food place in bay ridge
STAY AWAY. Low quality food and ALWAYS mess up the order. Don’t bother calling, they won’t fix it for you.
The most disrespectful and trashiest Chinese restaurant in Bay Ridge. The staff are unbelievably ride and nasty.

Pearl Of China. Classic NYC Chinese food, takeout is what I go for. I worked near by so I would always call 10 min before I head to my lunch break and it was always ready in under 15 minutes. No matter if I got the delish beef and broccoli or 6 dishes for my office, it was hot and ready waiting for me. You get what you pay for and that is true. Lunch specials are great and full serving dishes. Keeps you full for a good time.
Typical Chinese Food joint! Prices are decent & food quality passes. They aren't the most friendly people, but as long as you don't annoy them, they'll be alright.
Yes the staff are usually friendly and patient even when you come late. The food portions are smaller then New York Chinese takeout for the same price
Great food.
Good food good prices

The nastiest restaurant I have ever been to. The food is over priced and I have found bugs in my food. There was one time where I took one bite and threw up constantly. Service is very bad there are alot of bad people.
Always good food.
good food！
just order from them 3 time   food is amazing   will order again   dumpling taste the best
Great Chinese food, and the people are nice.

Ordered food yesterday for me, my children, and niece.  My Niece has an allergy to Gluten so I ordered her steamed chicken and mixed vegetables.  First, the order was screwed up.  I was given chicken with broccoli.  they rectified it rather quickly (why the one star) but then after we were essentially almost done with our meal, there was a nasty and large cockroach in the chicken and mixed vegetables.  It was nasty.  I immediately contacted the restaurant, told them to pick up the food, and demanded $$ back.  The guy came back, took the food, but was only willing to reimburse us for the chicken and broccoli.  So not only do they give us a dish with a cockroach (which means that the place is infested), but they refuse to reimburse us.  Never, ever going back there.  Recommend no one else does as well.  Will be reporting them to the NYC DOH and will dispute the charge on my card.
Food tasted rotten and ages old! Went home and I'm pretty sure i have food poisoning. Im not one to judge, but trust me... stay AWAY from this restaurant!!!
